text:
Currently Tomcat engine doesn't seem to fit the JTA standard for being
considered a JEE environment rather it looks at the Tomcat engine as a JSE
environment, which means it will not allow use of

		<jta-data-source>jdbc/myDataSource</jta-data-source>

within the persistence.xml (which is used by JPA implementation/spec)

Meaning datasource is not usuable within JPA context.
